programme.title: Angel and the Badman
programme.desc: When a gunslinger with a bad disposition is nursed back to health and desired by a Quaker girl, he finds himself having to choose between his lawless life or the peaceful world of his newfound love.

programme.title: Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: A homesteading family in 1867 Wyoming faces a crisis when the husband is killed and the wife must decide whether to remain or take her son and daughter back East.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Italian Count Alfredo Di Montova comes to North Fork. His unique clothing attracts the attention of town bully Sim Groder. When Groder pushes the count too far, Montova initiates a duel, and asks Lucas to assist with the rules.

programme.title: Christmas on the Coast
programme.desc: Tough and cynical New York celebrity novelist Dru Cassadine, known for her romance stories, is desperate for a breakthrough after a string of flops. Spurred on by brutal reviews and a not-so-subtle threat by her publisher to drop her, she is given just weeks to turn out a best seller. To get her creative juices flowing, Dru decides on a change of scenery. Reluctantly, she returns to her childhood home for the holidays. Landing in Harbor Pointe, a small picturesque beach town, a flood of memories washes over her. As the town prepares for Christmas and she struggles with her past, handsome local widower, Brysen Flynn and his spunky teenage daughter Peyton enter her life. Dru's tough New York heart melts as she befriends Peyton and romance begins to spark with Brysen on the Southern shore with an unexpected twist no one saw coming.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: Jimmy captures Jesse's brother Frank James after a bank robbery. Jesse feels that he needs to be loyal to his brother and breaks him out of jail. This forces Teaspoon and Jimmy to go out on the hunt to bring him back in for justice.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: While traveling, Lucas rescues a man named Griff, a corrupt gambling hall owner. When he reports Griff to the marshal, Lucas learns that a missing friend of his is dead and the marshal is using a new science called ballistics to solve the crime.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark is paralyzed after falling off his horse. When Doc Burrage suggests that warm mineral baths could help him recover, Lucas and Lou take Mark to the old Mission Springs. However, danger lies ahead when escapees arrive.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: In his first week on the job as the new constable of Jerome, Arizona, Jim Roberts gets to work arresting the town's troublemakers and teaching his timid deputy how to be a courageous lawman as they track down a stone-cold killer and his gang.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.sub-title: Last Shot at the OK Corral
programme.desc: In an odd twist of fate, photographers C.S. and Mollie Fly decide to open a studio next to a dusty corral in Tombstone, Arizona, and they end up taking the last shot of the Old West's most infamous gunbattle, the Shootout at the O.K. Corral.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: Nels Stack, a war veteran, joins the wagon train. He is now a pacifist who defends against any prejudice. Stack's mild manner leads others to label him a coward. But the tides turn when his kindness gets the train out of dangerous Indian territory.

programme.title: Christmas in the Rockies
programme.desc: After her father is hurt in a timber accident, Katie Jolly must enter a lumberjack competition to save her family's business. But when the paramedic who saved her dad's life also joins the contest, a romance sparks just in time for Christmas.

programme.title: Angel and the Badman
programme.desc: When a gunslinger with a bad disposition is nursed back to health and desired by a Quaker girl, he finds himself having to choose between his lawless life or the peaceful world of his newfound love.

programme.title: Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: A homesteading family in 1867 Wyoming faces a crisis when the husband is killed and the wife must decide whether to remain or take her son and daughter back East.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Italian Count Alfredo Di Montova comes to North Fork. His unique clothing attracts the attention of town bully Sim Groder. When Groder pushes the count too far, Montova initiates a duel, and asks Lucas to assist with the rules.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: Bubba's in a pinch when Cody urges him to ease his aching back with acupuncture. Cody and Misty have to find out why their herd is losing so many stillborn calves before it threatens their new business. Booger discovers the ups and downs of daddy duty when he takes care of Matthew for the day. He draws on the bonding time he had with his own grandfather to make a special new memory. The cowboys put their steakhouse dreams on the line to recruit a business partner and are confronted with their next steps: developing a full menu and creating a pop-up restaurant.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: The cowboys are more at home on the range than behind a desk, so when lost paperwork results in lost income, they agree that they need to lasso in some secretarial help. Bubba's back injury might keep him out of the saddle, but nothing can stop him from galloping ahead with making Andie's first birthday unforgettable with a secret surprise. Booger jumps at the chance to rebuild his family legacy by buying back his granddaddy's land, but is discouraged when his high-emotion offer is too low for the sellers. While Cody is eager to wow potential restaurant partners, his black-eyed peas - and just about everything else the guys dish up - get a big thumbs down from two chefs, threatening their plans for a pop-up steakhouse.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A brutal snowstorm makes the roads impassable and forces a stagecoach to stop at the McCain Ranch. Lucas gives the passengers shelter, but little does he know a dance hall girl, a drunk, and a famous gunslinger are his guests.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Brothers Charv and Kelly Banner play a joke on Lucas that soon gets out of hand when they contact a St. Louis marriage bureau to send a possible bride for Lucas. Mary Woodson arrives in North Fork ready for marriage, but Lucas wants no part of it.

programme.title: County Line: All In
programme.desc: The murder of a crooked lawyer on the county line forces two neighboring sheriffs to put aside their differences to take down the killer.

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks
programme.desc: After robbing a Mexican bank, two men have their getaway plan go wrong. When one bandit takes their one remaining horse and rides off with the gold, the other is captured. Years later, the two men face off in a deadly game of deceit and revenge.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark help Sid Halpern with his cattle drive. When bounty hunter Clemmie Martin confronts Halpern and gunfire erupts, Halpern and Martin both perish. Lucas tries to hide Halpern's criminal past from his widow and son.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Eddie Halstead is a hotel clerk in North Fork. His daughter, Lillian, who he hasn't seen since childhood, arrives in town. She is now a dance hall girl and Lucas discovers criminals are following her, focused on the stolen money in her possession.
